<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/157165</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>157165</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2331</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">The State of Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Zustand von Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'état de l'Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O estado de Israel</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il Dichiarare dell'Israele</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το κράτος του Ισραήλ</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El estado de Israel</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A collection of resources and links to subjects on the State of Israel and Zionism as presented by the Dinoe research center at the Hebrew University in Jerusalem</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Ansammlung Betriebsmittel und Links zu den 
Themen auf dem Zustand von Israel und von Zionism, wie durch das Dinoe
Forschungszentrum an der hebräischen Universität in Jerusalem 
dargestellt</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Une collection de ressources et de liens aux 
sujets sur l'état de l'Israel et du sionisme comme présenté par le 
centre de recherches de Dinoe à l'université hébreue à Jérusalem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Uma coleção dos recursos e das ligações aos 
assuntos no estado de Israel e de zionism como apresentado pelo centro
de pesquisa de Dinoe na universidade hebrew em Jerusalem</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Una collezione di risorse e di collegamenti agli 
oggetti sul Dichiarare dell'Israele e dello zionism come presentato 
dal centro di ricerca di Dinoe all'università ebraica a Gerusalemme</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Μια συλλογή των στοιχείων συμπεριφοράς και των 
συνδέσεων με τα θέματα στο κράτος του Ισραήλ και zionism όπως 
παρουσιάζεται από το ερευνητικό Dinoe κέντρο στο εβραϊκό 
πανεπιστήμιο στην Ιερουσαλήμ</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Una colección de recursos y de conexiones a los 
temas en el estado de Israel y del sionismo según lo presentado por 
el centro de investigación de Dinoe en la universidad hebrea en 
Jerusalén</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geschichte</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sionisme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Histoire</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">l'Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">History</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Storia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">L'Israele</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Zionism</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ισραήλ</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Sionismo</string>

          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Historia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Israel</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
